response.overview: Allison Morgan, a hairdresser in a small Washington town learns she's won millions playing the lottery. Distracted by her precocious three year old while buying her mother's weekly lottery tickets Allison buys an extra ticket for herself and pays no attention to where she puts it. Only until she learns she's won does she discover it's nowhere to be found. Believing the millions will fulfill all her dreams Allison's search for the ticket consumes her. Her obsession with the lost ticket takes her on a journey of self discovery where she is forced to confront who she would be with millions and who she is without.
response.tagline: Winning changed nothing. Losing changed everything.
response.title: Lottery Road
